content.text:
# 1987 IAAF World Race Walking Cup

|Location   =
|Nations participating  = 36
|Athletes participating = 326
|Races      = 3
|Website    =
|Previous   = 1985 St. John's
|Next       = 1989 L'Hospitalet
}}
The 1987 IAAF World Race Walking Cup was held on 2 and 3 May 1987 in the streets of New York City, USA.  The event was also known as IAAF Race Walking World Cup.
Complete results were published.
Medallists
{|
|-
|colspan=7 bgcolor=#eeeeee style=text-align:center;| Men
|-
